Really excited to talk about #rstats + RMarkdown for #rstatsnyc in about an hr! 

Slides at: https://t.co/AYSprYoK9d if you want to follow along or maybe live tweet!

Companion blog post: https://t.co/a6DbT0AA6c https://t.co/5SQfrHjFim

Shout out to @juliasilge and @drob's weekly tidytuesday screencasts from @thomas_mock. I've been constantly recommending them for people looking to take their #rstats game to the next level!  #rstatsnyc

Excited to hear from @cameliacassetet about causal inference for when you can't run an A/B test #rstatsnyc

But once it's set up, you can do it in #rstats with lm()! https://t.co/9l9dtkpllT
